parameters.Church: Percentage who attended church in previous week (from a state survey)
parameters.Teen: Number of pregnancies per 1000 teenage girls in state
parameters.CivilWar: Role in Civil War (B=border, C=Confederate, O=other, or U=union)

title: State Teen Pregnancy Rates
description:
Description
State teen pregnancy rates, Civil War participation, and church attendance.
usage: A data frame with 50 observations on the following 4 variables.
reference: State level data on teen pregnancies, church attendance, and role in the U.S. Civil War.
